TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IsolatedStorage extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public MustInherit Class IsolatedStorage Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class IsolatedStorage abstract : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 表示所有独立存储实现都必须从中派生的抽象基类。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which all isolated storage implementations must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-class-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-class-note.md)] 有关基于文件的独立存储的信息，请参阅 类。For information about file-based isolated storage, see the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 独立存储不适用于 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用。Isolated storage is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 相反，使用 `Windows.Storage` API 中包含的 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 命名空间中的应用程序数据类来存储本地数据和文件。Instead, use the application data classes in the `Windows.Storage` namespaces included in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] API to store local data and files. 有关详细信息，请参阅 Windows 开发人员中心的 [应用程序数据](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) 。For more information, see [Application data](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) in the Windows Dev Center.

span.span: Isolated Storage

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationIdentity As Object
public: property System::Object ^ ApplicationIdentity { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于确定独立存储范围的应用程序标识。

span.span: Gets an application identity that scopes isolated storage.
An that represents the identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于应用程序的定义包括与应用程序关联的所有程序集，因此可以使用这种类型的标识来确保只有与应用程序关联的程序集才有权访问独立存储。Since the definition of an application includes all assemblies associated with the application, you can use this type of identity to ensure that only assemblies associated with the application have access to the isolated storage.

exception.span: 该代码缺少访问此对象所需的 。

span.span: The code lacks the required to access this object.

exception.span: 这些权限由运行时基于安全策略授予。

span.span: These permissions are granted by the runtime based on security policy.

exception.span: 对象没有被应用程序 隔离。

span.span: The object is not isolated by the application .

An that represents the identity.

exception.span: 该代码缺少访问此对象所需的 。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the available free space for isolated storage, in bytes.

value.span: 独立存储的可用空间（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The available free space for isolated storage, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写此属性。The property overrides this property.

exception.span: 执行了需要访问 的操作，但是没有为此存储区定义该属性。

span.span: An operation was performed that requires access to , but that property is not defined for this store.

exception.span: 由于使用了部分证据来打开存储区，因此通过使用枚举所获取的存储没有定义完善的 。

span.span: Stores that are obtained by using enumerations do not have a well-defined property, because partial evidence is used to open the store.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CurrentSize As ULong
public: virtual property System::UInt64 CurrentSize { System::UInt64 get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("IsolatedStorage.CurrentSize has been deprecated because it is not CLS Compliant. To get the current size use IsolatedStorage.UsedSize")]
[<System.Obsolete("IsolatedStorage.CurrentSize has been deprecated because it is not CLS Compliant. To get the current size use IsolatedStorage.UsedSize")>]

summary.span: 获取表示独立存储当前大小的值。

span.span: Gets a value representing the current size of isolated storage.

value.span: 该独立存储范围内当前使用的存储单元的数目。

span.span: The number of storage units currently used within the isolated storage scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示独立存储范围内所有存储资源的总使用量。This property represents the total usage of all storage resources within the isolated storage scope. 实现此属性。 implements this property. 对于 对象，此值以字节为单位。In the case of objects, this value is in bytes. 对于其他存储对象（例如数据库）的实现，此值可能为其他存储单位。In the case of implementations of other storage objects, such as a database, this value might be in other units of storage.

exception.span: 独立存储区的当前大小未定义。

span.span: The current size of the isolated store is undefined.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStoragePermission GetPermission(class System.Security.PermissionSet ps) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function GetPermission (ps As PermissionSet) As IsolatedStoragePermission

param.name: ps
param.span: ，它包含授予尝试使用独立存储的代码的权限集。

span.span: The object that contains the set of permissions granted to code attempting to use isolated storage.

summary.span: 当由派生类实现时，从权限集中返回表示对独立存储的访问权限的权限。

span.span: When implemented by a derived class, returns a permission that represents access to isolated storage from within a permission set.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类上调用此方法可确定控制其使用的权限类型，并返回已授予的类型的权限。You call this method on derived classes to determine what permission type governs their use, and to return the permission of the type that has been granted. 使用此信息来确定允许的配额以及任何其他特定于派生类的独立存储设置。Use this information to determine the allowable quota and any other derived class-specific isolated storage settings.

param.name: newQuotaSize

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, prompts a user to approve a larger quota size, in bytes, for isolated storage.
in all cases.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property MaximumSize As ULong
public: virtual property System::UInt64 MaximumSize { System::UInt64 get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("IsolatedStorage.MaximumSize has been deprecated because it is not CLS Compliant. To get the maximum size use IsolatedStorage.Quota")]
[<System.Obsolete("IsolatedStorage.MaximumSize has been deprecated because it is not CLS Compliant. To get the maximum size use IsolatedStorage.Quota")>]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值表示独立存储的最大可用空间数量。

span.span: Gets a value representing the maximum amount of space available for isolated storage.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，该值可以采用不同的度量单位。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this value can take different units of measure.

value.span: 独立存储空间的最大数量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum amount of isolated storage space in bytes.

value.span: 派生类可以返回不同单位的值。

span.span: Derived classes can return different units of value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的默认实现 返回的值 （以字节表示）。The default implementation of the property returns the value of , which is expressed in bytes. 派生类可以用其他度量单位表示值。Derived classes can express the value in other units of measure. 此类实现的一个可能示例是独立存储数据库。A potential example of such an implementation is an isolated storage database. 你无法设置 ，但配额是在安全策略中配置的，并且可以进行设置。You cannot set , but the quota is configured in the security policy, and can be set. 代码在其证据的基础上接收空间配额，因此，如果使用不同的证据运行，则相同的代码可能会收到不同的配额 (例如，本地运行的同一应用程序以及来自 intranet 上的共享可接收) 的不同配额。Code receives a quota of space on the basis of its evidence, so the same code can receive a different quota if it is run with different evidence (for example, the same application run locally and from a share on an intranet can receive different quotas). 实现此属性。 implements this property.

span.span: The quota has not been defined.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scope As IsolatedStorageScope

summary.span: 获取指定用于隔离存储区的范围的 枚举值。

span.span: Gets an enumeration value specifying the scope used to isolate the store.

value.span: 值的按位组合， 指定用于隔离存储区的范围。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values specifying the scope used to isolate the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存储区通过组合 (用户、程序集、域等) 的因素进行隔离。Stores are isolated by a combination of factors (user, assembly, domain, and so on).

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property SeparatorExternal As Char
protected: virtual property char SeparatorExternal { char get(); };

summary.span: 获取可在目录字符串中使用的反斜杠字符。

span.span: Gets a backslash character that can be used in a directory string.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写后，可能会返回另一个字符。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, another character might be returned.

value.span: 默认实现返回 " \\ " (反斜杠) 字符。

span.span: The default implementation returns the '\\' (backslash) character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于获取目录字符串中使用的字符。This property can be used to get a character that is used in a directory string.

para.span: 当从继承时 ，可以重写 并返回 "" 之外的字符， \\ 以控制存储的命名语法。

span.span: When you inherit from , you can override and return a character other than the '\\' to control the naming syntax of the store.

para.span: 在 Windows 中 ，此分隔符是 " \\ "。

span.span: In a Windows this separator is a '\\'.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property SeparatorInternal As Char

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, another character might be returned.

value.span: 默认实现返回 (期间) 字符的 "."。

span.span: The default implementation returns the '.' (period) character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于获取目录字符串中使用的字符。This property can be used to get a character that is used in a directory string.

para.span: 当从继承时 ，可以重写 和返回除 "." 之外的字符，以控制存储的命名语法。

span.span: When you inherit from , you can override and return a character other than the '.' to control the naming syntax of the store.

para.span: 在 Windows 中 ，此分隔符是 "."。

span.span: In a Windows this separator is a '.'.
